General.Name: Gold Pacific Co. Ltd
General.Description: Gold Pacific Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells optical products and application specific integrated circuits in South Korea. It also distributes smart devices; and provides portable X-rays. The company was formerly known as CoreCross, Inc. and changed its name to Gold Pacific Co., Ltd. in March 2017. Gold Pacific Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Gwangju, South Korea.
